name: Bubble Cat 3
description:
Bubble Cat 3 is a cute-style strategy casual game!

Many special cats will lead you through different magical worlds. You will have to rescue kitties and defeat the BOSS. Lovely pets help you to complete levels and recover treasures.

Features:
- Innovative game modes, over 180 levels, very creative!
- Hundreds of unique worlds, located in the Windmill Valley, Secluded Jungle and Golden Island!
- Many different cats will help you easily complete adventure
- Cute pets help you get extra lives and coins
- Aiming line, Thunder ball and other props, make game more interesting
- Get big rewards by complete daily tasks and achievements!

Join us now and explore the world of BUBBLE CAT!
